name: Phenom Projection as Strike
effect: The Base Value of your offensive [@skill Phenom Projection @] is the same as your Base [@skill Strike @] Value.

name: Phenom Projection as Block or Dodge
effect: The Base Value of your defensive [@skill Phenom Projection @] is the same as your Base [@skill Block @] or [@skill Dodge @] Value.

name: Phenom Projection as Spell Projection
effect: The Base Value of [@skill Phenom Projection @] is the same as your Base [@skill Spell Projection @] Value.
